_header: All those that be christened and dear / Listeneth and ye may hear
Subjects: Katherine, saint, passion of; saints’ lives
_description: Passio sancte Katerine virginis — in short couplets

BodRawPoe34.First Lines:
All þat ben crystyn be leue & derelestnyth & ȝe
                    mow here…
BodRawPoe34.Last Lines:
…Euer in to that ylk blysTher þat seynt kateryn euyr
                    mys
BodRawPoe34.Attributed Title:
Explicit pascio sancte katerine virginis & martyris et cetera
                    (f. 9vb)

CULFf238.First Lines:
All tho that be crystenyd & derelystenyth and ye may
                    hereThe lyfe of a swete vyrgyneHur name ys clepyd
                    kateryn…
CULFf238.Last Lines:
…And brynge vs to that blysThere that mayde dwellyng
                    ys
CULFf238.Attributed Title:
here foloweþ þe lyfe of seynt kateryn (f.
                    45ra)
